tasks.label: StartTemporalServer
tasks.command: if ! curl -s http://localhost:7233/health > /dev/null; then echo 'Starting Temporal server...' && (temporal server start-dev > /tmp/temporal.log 2>&1 &) && sleep 2 && echo 'Temporal server started in background. Logs at /tmp/temporal.log' && echo 'Keeping terminal open...' && tail -f /tmp/temporal.log; else echo 'Temporal server is already running'; fi
